casebody.data:
SPIRIT AIRLINES, INC., a Florida Corporation, Appellant,
v.
ROLLS-ROYCE CORPORATION, a foreign profit corporation ; Rolls-Royce North America, Inc., a foreign profit corporation ; Rolls-Royce, PLC; a foreign profit corporation ; IAE International Aero Engines AG, a foreign profit entity ; and Pratt & Whitney, a division of United Technologies Corporation; a foreign profit corporation, Appellees. No. 4D17-3265 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [August 2, 2018]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
